fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Customs, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE (EU) 2016/1164. of 12 July 2016. laying down rules against tax avoidance practices that directly affect the functioning of the internal market. 
 
Council Directive 2011/16/EU (2) already provides for the mandatory automatic exchange of information between Member States on certain categories of income and capital, mainly of a non-financial nature, that taxpayers hold in Member States other than their State of residence.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Rante provides cloud-based compliance solutions for governments, particularly tax authorities, and financial institutions to address data exchanges and to combat tax evasion, money-laundering, and sanction violations. Our mission is to provide governments, financial institutions, and businesses with the necessary tools to combat tax evasion and establish a global compliance cloud for transparency. 
 
https://rante.com/about
